snippet: As reporters from around the world remain in Greece, covering the post-election political turmoil, Greek journalists continue to face intimidation for reporting on the rise of a xenophobic party from the far-right.

headline.main: Greek Journalists Dodge Threats and Yogurt to Cover Rise of Far-Right Party
